items.title: Seize the Opportunity â€“ Key Insights into the Marine Sensors Market Valued $1.9 Billion by 2028!
items.author: Globe Newswire
items.description: The Marine Sensors Market is estimated to grow from USD 1.4 Billion in 2023 to USD 1.9 Billion by 2028, at a CAGR of 6.5%. The market is driven by increasing demand for UUVs and AUVs, and technological advancements in marine sensors. However, the development of sensors that can withstand harsh marine environments is a challenge.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Honeywell is mentioned as one of the key players in the marine sensors industry, indicating its involvement and potential growth opportunities in this market.
